name: Columbia
description:
This is a beanie made by Columbia Sportswear in a Boy's One Size fits all. 
 The hat is navy blue with royal blue stripes, a small leather Columbia logo, very soft black fleece lining. 
 It was made in Taiwan with: shell: 85% acrylic, 15% wool, lining: 100% polyester. 
 The beanie measures 10 across and 8 tall when laid flat.
 This hat comes in good pre-owned condition with some slight pilling.
